entities.c: STANCE-Rolan: acknowledged his authority/support but refused to leave Rance's side. STATE: exhausted after days of relentless travel; refused rest to stay with Chosen. Suspects Rance's Gift is rarer/more dangerous than Firestarting—unprecedented power unseen 500 years, no one capable of training it. Confirmed Karsite blood magic is historical fact, not myth; official ban in place for decades but may be returning.
Queen's Own Companion. Met Senta at Collegium; offered support; told her Rance is in good hands.

Bond transfers Herald-basics/knowledge naturally to Chosen (Rance knows Empath capabilities, Mind-Healers, protocol without prior training). Companions monitor Chosen's condition through bond continuously. Connection strengthens with time/distance—thoughts and emotions become clearer as minds open to each other. 'Two beings becoming something greater than the sum of their parts.'

Historical practice of capturing people for ritual sacrifice, demon summoning, 'Fires of Vkandis Sunlord' consuming 'impure souls.' Officially banned in Karse for decades. If returning to such practices = major threat implication.
